text: The Jamestown Foundation is an American think tank that was founded in 1984 as a non-governmental organization (501(c)(3) non-profit organization).vgl. jamestown.org The foundation's stated goal is to inform and educate decision- makers about events and trends that they believe are of "strategic" importance to the United States. The foundation claims it provides material “without political bias, filters or agenda”. == Other websites == * Jamestown Foundation website * Jamestown Foundation at The Militarist Monitor website, last updated May 28, 2013. == References == Category:1984 establishments in the United States Category:Think tanks based in the United States
title: Jamestown Foundation
